sentences.sContent: “Please pardon my digression,” said Mary. “I didn’t mean to diminish the importance of our conversation.
sentences.sContent_eng: “Please pardon my digression,” said Mary. “I didn’t mean to diminish the importance of our conversation.
sentences.sCn: “请原谅我离题了，”玛丽说，“我并不想贬低我们谈话的重要性。

remMethod.val: 大会 (congress) 讨论有些离题 (digression) 了
